title: Microsoft rolls out Windows 10 build 19044.1645 with Search Highlights
content:
It’s that time again – we’re on the second Tuesday of April, and that means it’s Patch Tuesday. Microsoft is rolling out updates to all supported versions of Windows, including both Windows 11 and Windows 10. Specifically, updates are rolling out to Windows 10 versions 21H2, 21H1, and 20H2 are getting updated to build 19044.1645,

The post Microsoft rolls out Windows 10 build 19044.1645 with Search Highlights appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft is rolling out Windows 10 build 19044.1645 to the general public today, adding Search Highlights and other improvements.
